info.task: navigate forwards into a form landmark
info.title: Navigate forwards into a form landmark in interaction mode

setupScript.name: setFocusBeforeForm
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link before the form landmark
testPageDocument.getElementById('beforelink').focus();

user: With focus on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Top' link.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Top' link.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.
